name: configImport
syntax: configImport(path path, [, type] [, password], [, params], [, charset])
description: Imports a configuration based on the CFConfig format.

params.name: path
params.description: Path to the .CFConfig.json file or the data itself as a Struct.

params.name: type
params.description: Config Context to manipulate, server or web context.

params.name: password
params.description: password to access the configuration, depending on the value set for the attribute type.

params.name: params
params.description: placeholder parameters to use as actual data for the placeholders inside the configuration.

params.name: charset
params.description: charset to use to read the .CFConfig file, if not defined, Lucee will use the default resource charset.

examples.title: Example for importing a configuration
examples.description: Imports a configuration based on the CFConfig format from a file using a password stored in an environment variable.
